name: Indiscriminate DEMO
description:
This game is a DEMO, meaning there will probably be quite a few bugs and weird interactions (Do I know of any in this build? No comment). 

"Indiscriminate" follows a gritty American in a near future world where most of the world has been overrun by hideous monsters. Captured by the enemy, he must beat, blast and shoot is way through the hordes to finally claim victory in the war against the scourge. 

But none of that really matters in this demo! At the end of the day, you have a gun and everything else as very squishy and goopy innards, so you already know exactly what you're getting into.
